short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort Reddit comments by most downvoted first.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to see the most downvoted comments in a thread? Although Reddit has a "controversial" option which sorts the comments by a dislike to like ratio, it does not have a true downvote first sorting system.

Enter Reddit Downvote Sort.

With Reddit Downvote Sort you will be able to sort the comments by the most downvoted comments first!

NOTE: This extension only works when signed out of Reddit.
NOTE: Reddit Downvote Sort is developed independently, and is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with Reddit.
